introduction: Food is medicine - a fundamental principle of naturopathy. Our diet therapy program goes beyond simple nutrition to use food as a healing tool for various health conditions.
process: Our expert nutritionists create personalized meal plans based on your health condition, body constitution, and specific needs. We focus on whole foods, proper food combinations, and mindful eating practices to maximize nutritional benefits and support healing.
duration: Varies based on individual goals - typically 2-4 weeks for initial program with ongoing support
additionalInfo: Our diet therapy includes education on food selection, preparation methods, and sustainable eating habits that you can maintain long after your program ends.

introduction: Water has been used for healing since ancient times. Our comprehensive hydrotherapy program harnesses the therapeutic properties of water at various temperatures to promote healing and wellness.
process: We offer various hydrotherapy treatments including therapeutic baths, contrast baths, underwater massage, steam baths, and our signature Vichy Shower Massage. Each treatment is tailored to your specific condition and needs.
duration: Individual sessions: 30-60 minutes. Recommended course: 7-14 sessions
additionalInfo: We are the only hospital in Hyderabad offering the Vichy Shower Massage - a luxurious treatment where multiple shower heads deliver therapeutic water massage.

introduction: Essential oils extracted from plants have powerful therapeutic properties. Our aromatherapy treatments use pure, therapeutic-grade essential oils to promote physical and emotional healing.
process: Our certified aromatherapists blend essential oils specifically for your needs. Treatments may include inhalation therapy, aromatic massage, or diffusion therapy, depending on your condition.
duration: Sessions: 45-60 minutes. Recommended: 6-12 sessions for optimal results
additionalInfo: Each essential oil has unique properties - lavender for relaxation, peppermint for energy, eucalyptus for respiratory health. We customize blends for your specific needs.

introduction: Therapeutic massage is an ancient healing art that combines skilled touch with anatomical knowledge to promote health and wellbeing. Our expert therapists provide various massage techniques tailored to your needs.
benefits: Enhances flexibility and range of motion
process: We offer Swedish massage, deep tissue massage, Ayurvedic massage (Abhyanga), sports massage, and therapeutic massage. Your therapist will assess your condition and recommend the most appropriate technique.
duration: Sessions: 60-90 minutes. Frequency depends on condition - may range from weekly to monthly
additionalInfo: Massage therapy works best as part of a comprehensive wellness program. Regular sessions provide cumulative benefits for both physical and mental health.

introduction: This ancient Chinese healing practice uses fine needles to stimulate specific points on the body, promoting natural healing and pain relief by balancing the body's energy flow (Qi).
process: Our certified acupuncturists insert very fine needles at specific points along meridian pathways. The treatment is virtually painless and induces deep relaxation while stimulating the body's healing response.
duration: Initial session: 60-90 minutes. Follow-up: 45-60 minutes. Recommended: 6-12 sessions
additionalInfo: Acupuncture is recognized by the WHO as effective for over 100 conditions. It works by triggering the release of endorphins and influencing the autonomic nervous system.

introduction: Yoga is a holistic practice that unites body, mind, and spirit through physical postures (asanas), breathing techniques (pranayama), and meditation. Our programs are designed for all levels and specific health conditions.
process: Our experienced yoga instructors guide you through appropriate asanas, breathing exercises, and meditation practices. Classes are tailored to your fitness level and health goals, with therapeutic yoga available for specific conditions.
duration: Daily sessions: 60-90 minutes. Recommended minimum: 2-4 weeks for noticeable benefits
additionalInfo: We offer various yoga styles including Hatha, therapeutic yoga for specific conditions, and meditation sessions. Private sessions available for personalized attention.

introduction: Earth is one of nature's most powerful healing elements. Mud therapy uses specially prepared medicinal mud to detoxify, heal, and rejuvenate the body through its rich mineral content and cooling properties.
benefits: Provides cooling effect for heat-related conditions
process: We use clean, medicinal mud rich in minerals. The mud is applied to specific body parts or as full-body packs. As it dries, it draws out toxins and provides therapeutic cooling. The treatment concludes with a gentle cleansing.
duration: Sessions: 30-45 minutes. Recommended: 7-14 sessions for therapeutic course
additionalInfo: Mud therapy is particularly effective when combined with other naturopathic treatments. The minerals in mud are absorbed through the skin, providing systemic benefits.

introduction: Color therapy, or chromotherapy, uses the therapeutic properties of colors and light to balance energy and promote healing. Different colors vibrate at different frequencies, affecting our physical and emotional states.
process: Our chromotherapy treatments use colored lights in a controlled environment. You'll be exposed to specific colors based on your condition - red for energy, blue for calming, green for balance, etc. The treatment is deeply relaxing and non-invasive.
duration: Sessions: 20-40 minutes. Recommended: 8-12 sessions for optimal benefits
additionalInfo: Chromotherapy is often combined with meditation or relaxation therapy for enhanced effects. Each color has specific therapeutic properties that influence both physical and emotional health.
